turns.content:
Sure, here is an updated version of the order form with some additional fields and a categorization of the fields:

| Section | Field | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Customer | Company Name | The name of the company placing the order |
|  | Contact Person | The name of the person who will be the main point of contact for the order |
|  | Email | The email address of the contact person |
|  | Phone Number | The phone number of the contact person |
| Order Details | Order Number | The unique identifier for the order |
|  | Order Date | The date the order was placed |
|  | Delivery Date | The date the order is required to be delivered |
|  | Order Type | The type of order, such as new or repeat |
|  | Product Type | The type of product being ordered, such as yarn or finished garments |
|  | Product Description | A description of the product being ordered |
|  | Quantity | The quantity of the product being ordered |
|  | Unit of Measure | The unit of measurement for the quantity, such as meters or kilograms |
|  | Color | The color of the product being ordered |
|  | Texture | The texture of the product being ordered |
|  | GSM | The GSM (grams per square meter) of the product being ordered |
|  | Diameter | The diameter of the product being ordered |
|  | Stitch Length | The stitch length of the product being ordered |
|  | Stitch Type | The type of stitch being used for the product being ordered |
|  | Packaging | The packaging requirements for the product being ordered |
|  | Delivery Terms | The delivery terms for the order, such as FOB or CIF |
|  | Payment Terms | The payment terms for the order |
|  | Additional Comments | Any additional comments or requirements for the order |
| Shipping Address | Name | The name of the person or company to whom the order is being shipped |
|  | Address | The address where the order is being shipped |
|  | City | The city where the order is being shipped |
|  | State/Province | The state or province where the order is being shipped |
|  | Postal Code | The postal code for the shipping address |
|  | Country | The country where the order is being shipped |

I hope this updated version helps!
Can you convert the above table into a markdown form?

Certainly! Here's the table in markdown format:
```vbnet
| Field           | Description                              | Type     | Category              |
|-----------------|------------------------------------------|----------|-----------------------|
| Order ID        | Unique identifier for the order          | Text     | Order Information     |
| Order Date      | Date the order was placed                 | Date     | Order Information     |
| Product         | Name of the product being ordered         | Text     | Product Information   |
| Quantity        | Number of units of the product ordered    | Number   | Product Information   |
| Price per unit  | Price per unit of the product             | Currency | Product Information   |
| Total Price     | Total price of the order                  | Currency | Order Information     |
| Customer Name   | Name of the customer placing the order    | Text     | Customer Information  |
| Customer Email  | Email address of the customer             | Text     | Customer Information  |
| Customer Phone  | Phone number of the customer              | Text     | Customer Information  |
| Shipping Address| Address where the product will be shipped | Text     | Shipping Information  |
| Payment Method  | Method of payment for the order            | Text     | Payment Information   |
```
Please note that you can adjust the formatting as desired based on your needs.

I want to design a wireframe with your help for different domains of software related to the circular Knitting workshop and factory which is called KnitSuite from now on. Each domain will include some forms based on the features described above. The name of each form will be in this format {Form Name: Name of for} . Please when I send you the name of each form, please design the form in table format with these field: Category, Field title, Field type, Required, Description
If the field is drop-down list, its options should also be specified
Do you understand?
Yes, I understand. When you send me the name of each form, I will design it in table format with the specified fields.

{Form Name: Customer Registering}
If the title of the form is not appropriate, correct it

Sure, I understand. Here's the table for the "Customer Registering" form:

| Category | Field Title | Field Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Basic Information | Company Name | Text | Yes | The name of the company |
|  | Contact Name | Text | Yes | The name of the person who will be the primary contact for the company |
|  | Phone Number | Text | Yes | The primary phone number for the company |
|  | Email Address | Text | Yes | The primary email address for the company |
|  | Address | Text | Yes | The address of the company |
|  | City | Text | Yes | The city where the company is located |
|  | Country | Dropdown | Yes | The country where the company is located |
|  | Tax ID Number | Text | No | The tax identification number for the company, if applicable |
| Additional Information | Type of Business | Dropdown | Yes | The type of business the company is engaged in |
|  | Years in Business | Text | Yes | The number of years the company has been in operation |
|  | Number of Employees | Text | Yes | The number of people employed by the company |
| Login Information | Username | Text | Yes | The username the customer will use to log in to the system |
|  | Password | Text | Yes | The password the customer will use to log in to the system |
|  | Confirm Password | Text | Yes | A field to confirm the password entered by the customer |

Sure, I can help you with that. Here is a table for the "Order Registering" form:

| Category | Field title | Field type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| General | Order Number | Text | Yes | Unique identifier for the order |
| General | Order Date | Date | Yes | Date the order was placed |
| General | Delivery Date | Date | Yes | Date the order is expected to be delivered |
| General | Customer Name | Text | Yes | Name of the customer placing the order |
| General | Customer Code | Text | No | Code assigned to the customer |
| General | Order Status | Dropdown | Yes | Status of the order (e.g. Pending, In Progress, Completed) |
| General | Order Priority | Dropdown | Yes | Priority level of the order (e.g. High, Medium, Low) |
| Product | Product Name | Text | Yes | Name of the product being ordered |
| Product | Product Code | Text | No | Code assigned to the product |
| Product | Product Type | Dropdown | Yes | Type of the product being ordered (e.g. Yarn, Fabric, Accessories) |
| Product | Product Quantity | Number | Yes | Quantity of the product being ordered |
| Product | Product Price | Number | Yes | Price per unit of the product being ordered |
| Payment | Payment Method | Dropdown | Yes | Method of payment for the order (e.g. Cash, Credit Card, Bank Transfer) |
| Payment | Payment Status | Dropdown | Yes | Status of payment for the order (e.g. Paid, Unpaid, Partially Paid) |

Let me know if you need any further help!

Sure, here's a table for the "Add New Machine" form:

| Category | Field Title | Field Type | Required | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Machine Info | Machine Type | Text | Yes | The type of the new machine |
|  | Machine Brand | Text | Yes | The brand of the new machine |
|  | Machine Model | Text | Yes | The model of the new machine |
|  | Year of Manufacture | Number | Yes | The year the machine was manufactured |
|  | Purchase Date | Date | Yes | The date the machine was purchased |
|  | Purchase Price | Number | Yes | The purchase price of the machine |
| Machine Status | Machine Condition | Dropdown List | Yes | The condition of the machine, e.g. "New", "Used" |
|  | Machine Location | Text | Yes | The location of the machine in the factory |
|  | Installation Date | Date | No | The date the machine was installed |
|  | Installation Technician | Text | No | The name of the technician who installed the machine |
| Machine Specs | Machine Gauge | Number | Yes | The gauge of the machine |
|  | Number of Feeders | Number | Yes | The number of feeders on the machine |
|  | Number of Cylinders | Number | Yes | The number of cylinders on the machine |
|  | Number of Needles | Number | Yes | The number of needles on the machine |
|  | Maximum Speed | Number | Yes | The maximum speed of the machine in RPM |
